page.title: 02Canonteign area
page.content: { CANONTEIGN AREA.}MANY OF THE HOMES HAVE BEEN BUILT ON OLD MINE WORKINGS. RECENTLY ONE HOUSE CALLED HIGHER FRANKLANDS FOUND A DEEP MINE SHAFT SUDDENLY APPEAR IN THEIR GARDEN. THE MINES WERE EXCAVATED FOR IRON ORE WHICH WAS SHIPPED TO A FACTORY IN WAPPING LONDON TO BE USED AS PAINT FOR BATTLE SHIPS BECAUSE OF ITS UNIQUE QUALITY. THE MINES STOPPED WORKING ABOUT THIRTY YEARS AGO AND NOW ALL THAT CAN BE SEEN ARE DERELICT CHIMNEYS AND OLD SLAG HEAPS OF WASTE WHICH IS HIGH IN VARIOUS CHEMICALS SUCH AS ARSENIC. THERE WAS AN ATTEMPT TWO YEARS AGO FOR A COMPANY TO PROCESS THE WASTE USING THE RIVER TEIGN BUT LOCAL RESIDENTS ORGANISED A PRESSURE GROUP AND THE ATTEMPT WAS ABANDONED.MUCH OF THE LAND IN THIS AREA IS OWNED BY LORD EXMOUTH AND HE HAS NOW OPENED HIS GROUNDS TO THE PUBLIC AS A BUSINESS TO
